resources.string: Select this if you want to sound like an elf
Select this if you want to sound like Santa

This app is a voice changer app which needs to record your voice and therefore requires the "record audio" permission.\n\nPlease accept this permission or, if you are taken to the App Info page, then please tap on "Permissions" enable the "Microphone" permission, than tap "back" twice to return to the app
